#summary Quotation table (and related tables) in machine-readable dictionary.
#labels MRD,SQL,quotation

= Introduction =

Goal:
  * To add tables (to MRD database) in order to store quotations from the Wiktionaries (English and Russian now).

== Examples from English Wiktionary ==

Example from English Wiktionary:
{{{
 TEMPLATE REFERENCE:
#* {{RQ:Twain Huckleberry}}
#*: “Looky here — mind how you talk to me; I’m a-standing about all I can stand now — so don’t gimme no '''sass'''.”

 SIMPLE TEXT (WITHOUT REFERENCE)
#: ''The player made an impressive '''catch'''.''
#: ''Nice '''catch'''!''

 TEXT REFERENCE
#* '''2010''' October 27, [[w:The Sydney Morning Herald|The Sydney Morning Herald]], ''Howard says leader[s]hip row 'done '''to death'''' '',
#*: "I don't want to revisit his view and my view about whether I should have retired and who said what then," he told ABC Radio.
#*:"That's been done '''to death'''."
}}}

{{пример|текст=|перевод=|автор=|титул=|издание=|перев=|дата=|источник=}}

== Quotations - quotation table ==

fields in *quotation* table:
  * id (quotation.id)
  * Link to the appropriated definition (meaning_id == meaning.id)
  * Sentence text (quot_text_id == quot_text.id), see [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Template:usex template:usex].
  * Translation text (translation_id == quot_translation.id) 
  * Transcription  (transcription_id == quot_transcription.id)
  * Year (year_id == quot_year.id), 
  * Author (author_id == quot_author.id), 
  * Source title - титул (title_id == quot_title.id), 
  * Publisher (publisher_id == quot_publisher.id)
    * enwikt: text after 'Source title' and before page numbers
    * ruwikt: пример|..|издание=|
  * Source - источник (source_id == quot_source.id)

+ tables:
  * quot_text (+ language from lang_pos from meaning_id)
    * id
    * lang_id - language of the quote
    * text (UNIQUE)
  * quot_translation (native language, known => skip. It may contain transcription.)
    * id
    * text (UNIQUE)

  * quot_transcription 
    * id
    * text

  * quot_author
    * id
    * name (UNIQUE, Not NULL)
    * wikilink (UNIQUE, may be NULL) - a wikilink to Wikipedia (format: [[w:name|]]) for the author

  * quot_title
    * id
    * title (UNIQUE, Not NULL)
    * wikilink (UNIQUE, may be NULL) - a wikilink to Wikisource (format: [[s:title|]]) for the work

  * quot_year (integer (range: start-end?) or text?, + [http://en.wiktionary.org/wiki/Wiktionary:Quotations#The_use_of_abbreviations c., a., p.]) 
  * quot_publisher (издание in ruwikt)
  * quot_source = НКРЯ = Wiktionary:Quotations/Templates
